channel.title: SevenAtSevenSection1
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenSection1, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Greetings from Kyiv, where candles are the last option during wartime blackouts
item.description: Far-Flung Postcards is a weekly series in which NPR's international team shares moments from their lives and work around the world.

item.title: Photos: Scenes from the 150th Westminster Dog Show
item.description: Hundreds of dogs competed for the top prize at the Westminster Kennel Club Dog Show this week. Penny the Doberman pinscher was named best in show.

item.title: Alexa+, Amazon’s AI assistant, is now available to everyone in the U.S.
item.description: Amazon opens Alexa+ to everyone in the U.S. The AI feature is free for Prime members across devices, and free for everyone on mobile and web.

item.title: ElevenLabs raises $500M from Sequioia at a $11 billion valuation
item.description: ElevenLabs' valuation has raised more than three times in the last twelve months.

item.title: SNAK Venture Partners raises $50M fund to back vertical marketplaces
item.description: SNAK Venture Partners announced Wednesday the close of its oversubsubscribed $50 million debut fund, anchored by Pritzker Group.

item.title: After backlash, Adobe cancels Adobe Animate shutdown and puts app on ‘maintenance mode’
item.description: Adobe Animate will be discontinued on March 1, 2026, as Adobe shifts its focus to AI.
